Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Civale has been much better when starting at home with a 3.47 ERA and a.245 opponent batting average.
Hayden Birdsong has struggled on the road with a 4.78 ERA and a.213 opponent batting average.
San Francisco Giants have a team batting average of.220 in their last five games, while Milwaukee Brewers sit at.243.
Key players for the Giants include Matt Chapman, Heliot Ramos, and Michael Conforto, while the Brewers feature Willy Adames, William Contreras, and Rhys Hoskins.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for 2:10 PM ET/ 11:10 AM PT, broadcast on NBCSBA/BSWI and available to stream on fuboTV (Free Trial).
